main_definition: A common given name of Spanish or Portuguese origin, often used as an example in various idioms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Name used to illustrate a situation where someone is the center of attention or focus
meanings_and_examples.example: Whenever there's a problem at work, it seems like 'Carlos' has all eyes on him.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in an idiom referring to a person who stands out due to their noticeable qualities or actions
meanings_and_examples.example: She always brings up Carlos whenever she talks about her travels; he had quite the adventurous spirit!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to someone whose name is used in idioms as an example of attention and notoriety
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Carlos' always seems to be in every conversation, even when it's not his story.
